author: KELVIN CHAN, BEATRICE DUPUY and ARIJETA LAJKA Associated Press
title: Conspiracy theorists burn 5G towers claiming link to virus
description: Conspiracy theories linking new 5G mobile networks and the coronavirus pandemic are fueling arson attacks on cell towers in Europe
content:
LONDON -- 
The CCTV footage from a Dutch business park shows a man in a black cap pouring the contents of a white container at the base of a cellular radio tower. Flames burst out as the man jogs back to his Toyota to flee into the evening.
Its a scene that… [+5223 chars]
